Determine specific newmoon numbers

Source: R/prepare_moons.R
target_moons.Rd

target_moons determines which moons are in a window, based on a date and window width.

last_moon determines the most recently passed newmoon, based on a date.

target_moons(
  main = ".",
  moons = NULL,
  end_moon = NULL,
  lead_time = 12,
  date = Sys.Date(),
  control_files = files_control(),
  arg_checks = TRUE
)

last_moon(
  main = ".",
  moons = NULL,
  date = Sys.Date(),
  control_files = files_control(),
  arg_checks = TRUE
)

Arguments

main

character value of the name of the main component of the directory tree.
moons

Moons data.frame. See prep_moons.
end_moon

integer (or integer numeric) newmoon number of the last sample to be included. Default value is NULL, which equates to the most recently included sample.
lead_time

integer (or integer numeric) value for the number of timesteps forward a cast will cover.
date

Date used for defining a window (starting with moons subsequent to the date) or a previous moon (before or on the date).
control_files

list of names of the folders and files within the sub directories and saving strategies (save, overwrite, append, etc.). Generally shouldn't need to be edited. See files_control.
arg_checks

logical value of if the arguments should be checked using standard protocols via check_args. The default (arg_checks = TRUE) ensures that all inputs are formatted correctly and provides directed error messages if not.

Value

target_moons: numeric vector of the moon numbers targeted by the date window. last_newmoon: numeric value of the last moon number.

Examples

 # \donttest{
  setup_dir()

#> ------------------------------------------------------------
#> This is portalcasting v0.20.0
#> ------------------------------------------------------------
#> Establishing portalcasting directory at
#>  /tmp/RtmppX5q9A/file4ca251e6eebb/reference
#> ------------------------------------------------------------
#> Filling directory with standard content
#>  -Downloading raw files
#>   -PortalData
#>   -portalPredictions
#>  -Filling casts folder with files from archive
#>  -Filling fits folder with files from archive
#>  -Writing model scripts
#>   -AutoArima
#>   -ESSS
#>   -NaiveArima
#>   -nbGARCH
#>   -nbsGARCH
#>   -pevGARCH
#>   -simplexEDM
#>   -GPEDM
#>   -jags_RW
#>  -Adding data files to data subdirectory
#>   -lunar data file
#>   -rodents data files
#>    -all
#>    -controls
#>    -exclosures
#>    -dm_controls
#>    -all_interp
#>    -controls_interp
#>    -exclosures_interp
#>    -dm_controls_interp
#>   -covariate data files
#>   -metadata file
#> ------------------------------------------------------------
#> Directory successfully instantiated
#> ------------------------------------------------------------
  target_moons()

#>  [1] 541 542 543 544 545 546 547 548 549 550 551 552
  last_moon()

#> [1] 540
 # }
